attributes.action: Request the owners Seddon Homes to demolish the derelict Golden Lion pub in Withington Manchester , clear the site and make it safe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Large developers can put profit before the local community and allow their land and buildings  to be abandoned to grafitti,vandalism and anti-social behaviour while they wait for their planning applications to be approved. The former Golden Lion pub in Withington Manchester is such an example of neglect. It has such a negative impact on the neighbourhood that local residents have finally said enough is enough.  They have launched a campaign to put pressure on Seddon Homes  to take responsibility for this disgaceful eyesore.
